timeline.message:
Increase DefaultQueryPlanner stopwatch granularity

Increase the granularity of logging the timing details for expanding
bounded query ranges in the DefaultQueryPlanner with a separate
stopwatch.

Fixes #865

timeline.bodyText: Am I missing where this is getting used?
timeline.author: alerman

replies.bodyText: You're not, it was accidentally imported. I'll remove it.
replies.author: lbschanno
